document.full_text: on wednesday, the lede continues to supplement reporting from our colleagues in japan on the post-earthquake crisis, including efforts to regain control of a damaged nuclear plant.
document.title: the lede: march 16 updates on japan's nuclear crisis and earthquake aftermath
lines_and_colors: on wednesday, the lede continues to supplement reporting from our colleagues in japan on the post-earthquake crisis, including efforts to regain control of a damaged nuclear plant.
